global.title: U-Dig It AI Community Engagement Playbook
global.description: Strategies to invite customers into community spaces and build advocacy.
global.guardrails: Always encourage authentic interaction. Never force participation.

welcome_invite.headline: 🎉 Join Our AI Builders Community
body: Your purchase of {{PRODUCT_TITLE}} includes access to our exclusive AI community.

icebreaker_prompt.headline: 👋 Introduce Yourself
icebreaker_prompt.body: Share who you are, what you’re building, and what you hope to achieve with AI.

weekly_prompt.headline: 🔥 Weekly Win Wednesday
weekly_prompt.body: Post your biggest AI win this week — big or small. Inspire others!

weekly_prompt.headline: ❓ Expert AMA Friday
weekly_prompt.body: Our team will answer your AI questions live in the community.

peer_collab.headline: 🤝 Collaboration Corner
peer_collab.body: Find accountability partners, share projects, and co-create workflows.

referral_boost.headline: 🎁 Invite a Friend, Earn Rewards
referral_boost.body: Share your referral link in the community. Help others and earn {{REFERRAL_REWARD}}.

spotlight.headline: 🌟 Member Spotlight
spotlight.body: We’ll feature top contributors in our blog and newsletters.

integration.moderation_guidelines: Respectful, inclusive, no spam or self-promotion outside designated areas.
